meanings.definition: The quality or state of being blimperies.
meanings.sent1: Her blimperies were evident in the way she skipped joyfully around the garden.
meanings.sent2: The blimperies of the puppy made everyone smile.
meanings.sent3: The blimperies of the clown entertained the children at the party.
meanings.sent4: The blimperies of the sunset painted the sky in shades of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The blimperies of the music filled the room with happiness.

meanings.definition: Actions or behaviors characteristic of blimperies.
meanings.sent1: His blimperies included singing loudly in the shower every morning.
meanings.sent2: The blimperies of the toddler included giggling and running around the house.
meanings.sent3: The blimperies of the squirrel stealing nuts from the bird feeder amused the family.
meanings.sent4: The blimperies of the wind rustling through the leaves created a peaceful atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The blimperies of the waves crashing against the shore were mesmerizing.
